infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: BuddyBoard uses Face ID / Touch ID to help you securely sign in on this device.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: BuddyBoard uses your location to support arrival detection and location-based features.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: BuddyBoard needs camera access to let you capture photos for posts and messages.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: BuddyBoard needs photo library access to let you choose images for posts and messages.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: BuddyBoard needs permission to save images to your photo library when you choose to download media.
